text: If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you.
author: Les Brown

text: Anytime you suffer a setback or disappointment, put your head down and plow ahead.
author: Les Brown

text: Accept responsibility for your life. Know that it is you who will get you where you want to go, no one else.
author: Les Brown

text: We have to live life with a sense of urgency so not a minute is wasted.
author: Les Brown

text: Your smile will give you a positive countenance that will make people feel comfortable around you.
author: Les Brown

text: If you take responsibility for yourself you will develop a hunger to accomplish your dreams.
author: Les Brown

text: Accept the consequences of your actions in order to become the agent of your mental, physical, spiritual and material success.
author: Les Brown

text: You need to make a commitment, and once you make it, then life will give you some answers.
author: Les Brown

text: Your goals are the road maps that guide you and show you what is possible for your life.
author: Les Brown

text: As you reach your goals, set new ones. That is how you grow and become a more powerful person.
author: Les Brown

text: Review your goals twice every day in order to be focused on achieving them.
author: Les Brown

text: Make each day count by setting specific goals to succeed, then putting forth every effort to exceed your own expectations.
author: Les Brown

text: Love yourself unconditionally, just as you love those closest to you despite their faults.
author: Les Brown

text: Your level of belief in yourself, will inevitably manifest itself, in whatever you do.
author: Les Brown

text: Help others achieve their dreams and you will achieve yours.
author: Les Brown

text: In the end, it is the person you become, not the things you have achieved, that is the most important.
author: Les Brown

text: Forgive yourself for your faults and your mistakes and move on.
author: Les Brown

text: Our ability to handle life's challenges is a measure of our strength of character.
author: Les Brown

text: If you're not willing to risk, you cannot grow. If you cannot grow, you cannot be your best. If you cannot be your best, you cannot be happy.
author: Les Brown

text: You are the only real obstacle in your path to a fulfilling life.
author: Les Brown

text: Forgive those who have hurt you.
author: Les Brown

text: Goals help you channel your energy into action.
author: Les Brown

text: I believe that life is a journey, often difficult and sometimes incredibly cruel, but we are well equipped for it if only we tap into our talents and gifts and allow them to blossom.
author: Les Brown

text: You don't get in life what you want; you get in life what you are.
author: Les Brown

text: Life takes on meaning when you become motivated, set goals and charge after them in an unstoppable manner.
author: Les Brown

text: Someone's opinion of you does not have to become your reality.
author: Les Brown

text: When life knocks you down, try to land on your back. Because if you can look up, you can get up. Let your reason get you back up.
author: Les Brown

text: Wanting something is not enough. You must hunger for it. Your motivation must be absolutely compelling in order to overcome the obstacles that will invariably come your way.
author: Les Brown

text: You cannot expect to achieve new goals or move beyond your present circumstances unless you change.
author: Les Brown

text: Don't let the negativity given to you by the world disempower you. Instead give to yourself that which empowers you.
author: Les Brown

text: The only limits to the possibilities in your life tomorrow are the buts you use today.
author: Les Brown

text: It takes someone with a vision of the possibilities to attain new levels of experience. Someone with the courage to live his dreams.
author: Les Brown

text: If you put yourself in a position where you have to stretch outside your comfort zone, then you are forced to expand your consciousness.
author: Les Brown

text: When life knocks you down, try to land on your back. Because if you can look up, you can get up.
author: Les Brown

text: In every day, there are 1,440 minutes. That means we have 1,440 daily opportunities to make a positive impact.
author: Les Brown

text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: Les Brown

text: The harder the battle, the sweeter the victory.
author: Les Brown

text: Life has no limitations, except the ones you make.
author: Les Brown

text: Practice only makes for improvement.
author: Les Brown

text: You must remain focused on your journey to greatness.
author: Les Brown

text: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
author: Les Brown

text: Give yourself a break. Stop beating yourself up! Everyone makes mistakes, has setbacks and failures. You don't come with a book on how to get it right all the time. You will fail sometimes, not because you planned to, but simply because you're human. Failure is a part of creating a great life. Stand up to it and handle it with grace. Because, you can.
author: Les Brown

text: Don't let someone else's opinion of you become your reality.
author: Les Brown

text: We are living in very challenging times. Pressured in the workplace and stressed out at home, people are trying to make sense of their lives.
author: Les Brown

text: Lions don't have to roar. There is power in silence, confidence, and persistence. Those who work don't talk, and those who talk don't work. Handle your business. Measure your efforts by results. Focus your time, energy, and activity on mastering and executing a plan.
author: Les Brown

text: We have to live life with a sense of urgency, so not a minute is wasted.
author: Les Brown

text: You cannot expect to achieve new goals or move beyond your present circumstances unless you change.
author: Les Brown

text: It is better to aim high and miss than to aim low and hit.
author: Les Brown

text: Align yourself with people that you can learn from, people who want more out of life, people who are stretching and searching and seeking some higher ground in life.
author: Les Brown

text: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.
author: Les Brown

text: Believe that you possess a basic goodness, which is the foundation for the greatness you can ultimately achieve.
author: Les Brown

text: The only thing that can possibly keep you from going after your dreams is the person standing in your shoes, wearing your clothes, and thinking your negative thoughts.
author: Les Brown

text: No one rises to low expectations
author: Les Brown

text: Don't underestimate yourself. You are capable of more than you can ever imagine.
author: Les Brown

text: We were all born with a certain degree of power. The key to success is discovering this innate power and using it daily to deal with whatever challenges come our way.
author: Les Brown

text: If you're going through hell, don't stop, keep moving!
author: Les Brown
